name: Anime Girl Run
description:
Best Japanese manga anime game of recent times!

Our manga comic super-hero has to escape from her anime enemies to stay alive in this action fight. Help her survive this epic adventure!

• Escape from your anime enemies in a single and fun race
• This game is set in Japan, with unique settings and anime manga characters
• Throughout the game you will find temples and Japanese-style ports
• A fun 3D escape for children and adults of all age
• Win the fight in this race for our anime manga hero survival
• An escape and strategy game

Download this anime manga escape game and help our hero to win the battle. Do not stop running!

Twitter: @bravocterogames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
